mapper.select: select supplier_id, supplier_no, supplier_name, product_type, principal, contact_way, status from supplier;
mapper.insert: insert into supplier (supplier_id, supplier_no, supplier_name, product_type, principal, contact_way, status) values (#{supplierId}, #{supplierNo}, #{supplierName}, #{productType}, #{principal}, #{contactWay}, #{status});
mapper.update:
update supplier
supplier_name = #{supplierName},
product_type = #{productType},
status = #{status},
principal = #{principal},
contact_way = #{contactWay},
where supplier_id=#{supplierId};
